attributes.action: All teachers in the UK should be given access to a free flu jab
attributes.additional_details: Other frontline workers are eligible for a free flu jab but not teachers or staff who work in schools. The risk from Covid and flu is going to be an ongoing problem this winter. I want staff working in schools to be protected.
attributes.background: To protect teachers from flu and reduce teacher absence form school.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552007
